match.start_expr: (isUndefined(MY.OSG_NODE_VALIDATED) || MY.OSG_NODE_VALIDATED) && (isUndefined(MY.RecentJobStarts) || RecentJobStarts < 1000) && (isUndefined(TARGET.ProjectName) != True && TARGET.ProjectName != "") && (GLIDEIN_Site =!= "AMNH" || (regexp("jlab.org", User) != True && User =!= "cgomes02@services.ci-connect.net")) && (regexp("CancerComputer", GLIDEIN_ResourceName) =!= True || stringListMember(TARGET.ProjectName, "SBGrid,SPLINTER,TG-MCB130135,BioGraph,swipnanobio,SINGE,SSGAforCSP,sweeps,TG-MCB190026,PNGtemplate,PainDrugs", ",") || regexp("^COVID19", TARGET.ProjectName)) && (isUndefined(WantsStashCvmfs) || !WantsStashCvmfs || isUndefined(CVMFS_stash_osgstorage_org_REVISION) || isUndefined(SUBMITTER_stash_osgstorage_org_REVISION) || CVMFS_stash_osgstorage_org_REVISION >= SUBMITTER_stash_osgstorage_org_REVISION)

job.comment: Define job constraint and schedds globally for simplicity

job.query_expr: isUndefined(RequiresWholeMachine) && (ITB_Sites =!= True) && (ITB_Factory =!= True) && isUndefined(RequiresLongWalltime) && isUndefined(RequiresBigMem) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0)

match.start_expr: (((DESIRED_Sites=?=undeined) || stringListMember(GLIDEIN_Site,DESIRED_Sites,",")) && (UNDESIRED_Sites=?=undefined || !stringListMember(GLIDEIN_Site,UNDESIRED_Sites,",")) && (TARGET.ITB_Sites =!= True) && (TARGET.ITB_Factory =!= True) && (MY.HAS_SINGULARITY =?= True) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0) && (regexp("xd-login.opensciencegrid.org", User) || regexp("csiu.grid.iu.edu", User) || regexp("ci-connect.net", User) || regexp("uchicago.edu", User)))

job.query_expr: isUndefined(DESIRED_Sites) && isUndefined(RequiresWholeMachine) && (ITB_Sites =!= True) && (ITB_Factory =!= True) && isUndefined(RequiresLongWalltime) && isUndefined(RequiresBigMem) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0) && isUndefined(x509userproxysubject) && (regexp("xd-login.opensciencegrid.org", User) || regexp("csiu.grid.iu.edu", User) || regexp("ci-connect.net", User) || regexp("uchicago.edu", User))

isUndefined(RequiresWholeMachine) && (ITB_Sites =!= True) && (ITB_Factory =!= True) && isUndefined(RequiresLongWalltime) && isUndefined(RequiresBigMem) && (isUndefined(RequestGPUs) || RequestGPUs == 0)

group.name: spt-osgvo
group.comment: SPT dedicated resources, but under OSG VO

group.name: xenon1t
group.comment: Using a XENON1T credential to submit under that XENON1T VO instead of the OSG VO
